reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Producing publications on population and sexual health and rights

description.narrative: The project objective is to produce high quality and innovative materials for global education. The emphasis is on Human Rights-based Approach global responsibility and inclusive and sustainable development. The project have three :1. Provide both theoreti cal and practical publication for organizations consultants and civil servants working in development co operation. The starting point is the right to development and the fact that sustainable development can not take place unless all members of society ar e involved and their potential realized. 2. The United Nations Population Fund's annual report 2015 and 2016.United Nations Population Fund's annual report (State of World Population Report 2015 and 2016) are translated into Finnish. Finnish language repor ts will support global education in schools (high schools colleges vocational colleges). The report offers each year to-date information on population and sexual health and rights.3. Produce an on-line journal for young people (target group 16-year-olds).Y oung people will produce the journal by themselves with the help of Vaestoliitto and Curly Association. Also Nepalese Malawians and Central Asian young people will take part in creating the journal.The journal will concentrate on human rights (with emphasi s on sexual rights) globally. The main message is the principle of global partnership and working together for sustainable development. prosperity.
